original_text: The shape of the city was a square. It was as long as it was wide. The angel measured the city with his stick. It was 12,000 stadia (2,400 kilometres) long. It was as wide and as high as it was long.
korean_text: 그 성은 네모가 반듯하여 길이와 너비가 같은지라 그 갈대 자로 그 성을 측량하니 만 이천 스다디온이요 길이와 너비와 높이가 같더라

sentences.original_text: The shape of the city was a square.
It was as long as it was wide.
The angel measured the city with his stick.
sentences.korean_translation: 천사가 자기 지팡이로 그 도시를 쟀다.

sentences.original_text: It was as wide and as high as it was long.
